title: (x) Xpays logo - custom designed {Mark S}
content:
hey all,  
just wanting to know if anyone had an idea as to what this font might be.  
thanks in advance,  
aeron.

comments.content: I think they just made it up.
I think Mark is right it is soooooo clunky & naive. Had to be made up. Or heavily modfied.
